steps.name: Prepare team via backend, add members, and create group conversation
Login as new team member in Android app
Verify group conversation is visible and start a new conversation flow
Search for team owner and start 1:1 conversation
Send message to team owner from the new member and return to conversation list
Send message to the new member via backend
Wait for notification popup to disappear
Verify unread message count and open unread conversation
Verify received message is visible in conversation
Open group conversation and verify mention is visible when sent via backend
